home.title: The architecture of clarity.
home.lead: ZameFlow builds focused software — from finance tools to habit trackers — designed to reduce noise and elevate professional workflows.
home.products_desc: Otvorite aplikaciju da vidite stranicu aplikacije, politiku privatnosti i uslove.

contact.title: Get in touch
contact.lead: For product questions, privacy requests, or store review inquiries, email us below. Each app can also be reached via <app>@zameflow.com.
contact.general_desc: Use these for anything not tied to a specific app.
contact.privacy_requests_desc: If you need to exercise data rights (GDPR/RODO) or have questions about Privacy Policy / Terms, email contact@zameflow.com and include the app name in the subject.

habitswipe.title: Habitswipe
habitswipe.description: A habit-building app with reminders, progress analytics, and social accountability to help you stay consistent.
habitswipe.long_description: Habitswipe helps you build consistency with habit tracking, social motivation, and smart automation. It combines fast daily check-ins, clear progress analytics, and an AI coach in one place with privacy-focused data handling.
habitswipe.summary_point_1_text: set recurring habits and anti-habits, then track completion with clear daily and weekly progress views.
habitswipe.summary_point_2_text: follow friends, share progress and stay consistent with reminders and accountability loops.
habitswipe.summary_point_3_text: connect tools like Notion, Telegram, Google Calendar, Habitica and Apple Reminders.

vanta.title: Vanta
vanta.description: A privacy-first personal finance app for budgets, spending visibility, and secure bank connectivity with explicit consent.
vanta.long_description: Vanta is a privacy-first personal finance app designed for daily money control. Your core data stays on-device, while bank connectivity is enabled only after explicit consent, so you can monitor accounts and spending securely.
vanta.summary_point_1_text: your personal finance data is stored locally on your device.
vanta.summary_point_2_text: only when you connect accounts and provide consent; authentication happens with your bank.

koalin.title: Koalin
koalin.description: A collection catalog system for porcelain and ceramics with provenance, hallmarks, photos, and inventory records.
koalin.long_description: Koalin helps collectors identify, catalog, and manage porcelain and ceramic pieces in a structured way. It keeps provenance notes, hallmarks, photos, and inventory metadata organized so every item in your collection is easy to track.
koalin.summary_point_1_text: record items with provenance, hallmarks, photos and detailed inventory attributes.
koalin.summary_point_2_text: keep collections structured with search, filtering and status tracking for each piece.
koalin.summary_point_3_text: collection data stays on-device by default unless you explicitly export or share it.

about.title: People behind ZameFlow
about.lead: We build focused products with practical design and strong privacy defaults.
about.focus_1: Clear, low-noise product experiences for daily work.
about.focus_3: Fast iteration with practical user feedback loops.
about.mission_body: ZameFlow exists to create software that is simple to use, predictable in behavior, and respectful of user data.
about.focus_4: Maximum app configurability and personalization, so each user can tailor workflows, views, and behavior to their own needs.

privacy.meta: Privacy Policy for Habitswipe by ZameFlow.
privacy.title: Habitswipe: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: We care about your privacy. User data is handled according to strong security practices and is not shared with third parties without your consent.
privacy.bullet_1: You have full control over your data.
privacy.bullet_2: Information is stored securely and encrypted where applicable.
privacy.bullet_3: We do not sell your data to advertisers.

terms.meta: Terms of Service for Habitswipe by ZameFlow.
terms.title: Habitswipe: Terms of Service
terms.intro: By using Habitswipe, you accept the following terms:
terms.bullet_1: You are responsible for your own data and habits.
terms.bullet_2: Integrations with external tools require your consent.
terms.bullet_3: All use must comply with applicable law.

privacy.meta: Privacy Policy for Vanta by ZameFlow.
privacy.title: Vanta: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This Privacy Policy explains how ZameFlow processes personal data in connection with Vanta.
privacy.s1_p: The controller of your personal data is ZameFlow.
privacy.s2_intro: Depending on how you use the app, we may process:
privacy.s2_b1: User-provided data such as budgets, categories, and notes stored on your device.
privacy.s2_b2: Banking data if you connect accounts, such as account identifiers, balances, and transaction history, with your consent.
privacy.s2_b3: Support communication data if you contact us by email.
privacy.s2_b4: Limited technical data for troubleshooting when you request support.
privacy.s2_bank: Bank connectivity is enabled only after explicit consent and authentication through your bank.
privacy.s3_b1: Provide and maintain the app's core functionality.
privacy.s3_b2: Enable optional features that you request and approve.
privacy.s3_b3: Respond to support requests and communicate with you.
privacy.s3_b4: Maintain security, prevent abuse, and troubleshoot issues.
privacy.s4_b1: Contract (Art. 6(1)(b)) to provide the app features you request.
privacy.s4_b2: Consent (Art. 6(1)(a)) for optional features requiring permission.
privacy.s4_b3: Legitimate interests (Art. 6(1)(f)) for security and limited diagnostics.
privacy.s4_b4: Legal obligation (Art. 6(1)(c)) where required by law.
privacy.s5_p: We do not sell personal data. We share data only when needed to provide the service or comply with law, and we use safeguards with processors.
privacy.s6_b1: App data is designed to be stored on-device unless a feature explicitly states otherwise.
privacy.s6_b2: Support correspondence is retained only as needed to resolve requests and for a reasonable period after.
privacy.s7_p1: Where applicable law grants such rights, you may access, correct, delete, restrict, object to processing, and request portability of your personal data.
privacy.s7_p2: You may also lodge a complaint with your local data protection authority.
privacy.s8_p: We apply technical and organizational security measures appropriate to risk.
privacy.s9_p: We may update this policy from time to time and will update the date shown on this page.

terms.meta: Terms of Service for Vanta by ZameFlow.
terms.title: Vanta: Terms of Service
terms.intro: These Terms govern your use of Vanta. By using the app, you agree to these Terms.
terms.s1_p: You must be legally allowed to use the app in your country and meet any minimum age or consent requirements.
terms.s2_b1: Use the app lawfully and do not abuse, disrupt, or reverse-engineer it.
terms.s2_b2: Do not use the app to violate the rights of others.
terms.s2_b3: Keep your device secure to protect locally stored data.
terms.s3_p: Vanta provides organizational tools and does not provide financial, investment, tax, or legal advice.
terms.s4_p: If you connect bank accounts, third-party connectivity and your bank's authorization flow apply under their own terms.
terms.s5_p: You are responsible for your use of the app and for maintaining the security of your device and accounts.
terms.s6_p: The app and related materials are owned by ZameFlow. You receive a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable license for personal use unless stated otherwise.
terms.s7_p: The app is provided as is and as available, without guarantees of uninterrupted operation or fitness for a particular purpose.
terms.s8_p: To the maximum extent permitted by law, ZameFlow is not liable for indirect or consequential damages arising from use of the app.
terms.s9_p: You may stop using the app at any time. Access may be suspended for security or legal reasons.
terms.s10_p: These Terms are governed by the laws of Poland, without prejudice to mandatory consumer protections in your country.

privacy.meta: Privacy Policy for Koalin by ZameFlow.
privacy.title: Koalin: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This Privacy Policy explains how ZameFlow processes personal data in connection with Koalin.
privacy.s1_p: The controller of your personal data is ZameFlow.
privacy.s2_intro: Depending on how you use the app, we may process:
privacy.s2_b1: Collection data entered by the user, such as item details, notes, and provenance data.
privacy.s2_b2: Photos if you choose to add them from camera or library.
privacy.s2_b3: Support communication data if you contact us by email.
privacy.s2_b4: Limited technical data for troubleshooting when you request support.
privacy.s3_b1: Provide and maintain the app's core functionality.
privacy.s3_b2: Enable optional features that you request and approve.
privacy.s3_b3: Respond to support requests and communicate with you.
privacy.s3_b4: Maintain security, prevent abuse, and troubleshoot issues.
privacy.s4_b1: Contract (Art. 6(1)(b)) to provide the app features you request.
privacy.s4_b2: Consent (Art. 6(1)(a)) for optional features requiring permission.
privacy.s4_b3: Legitimate interests (Art. 6(1)(f)) for security and limited diagnostics.
privacy.s4_b4: Legal obligation (Art. 6(1)(c)) where required by law.
privacy.s5_p: We do not sell personal data. We share data only when needed to provide the service or comply with law, and we use safeguards with processors.
privacy.s6_b1: App data is designed to be stored on-device unless a feature explicitly states otherwise.
privacy.s6_b2: Support correspondence is retained only as needed to resolve requests and for a reasonable period after.
privacy.s7_p1: Where applicable law grants such rights, you may access, correct, delete, restrict, object to processing, and request portability of your personal data.
privacy.s7_p2: You may also lodge a complaint with your local data protection authority.
privacy.s8_p: We apply technical and organizational security measures appropriate to risk.
privacy.s9_p: We may update this policy from time to time and will update the date shown on this page.
